1. The Shaken Sweet Tea:
Introducing new Shaken Sweet Tea. For the first time, we’re brewing our high quality Teavana® black iced tea double-strength with real cane sugar. It’s the authentic Sweet Tea flavor you love!

2.Caffè Vanilla Light Frappuccino:
Who doesn’t enjoy the rich, creamy taste of vanilla? Lose the calories, add coffee and milk and you have the makings of the ultimate sensible indulgence. And, at a mere 140 calories for a Tall (12 fl oz) serving, it’s destined to become a summer favorite.

3.Chocolate Smoothie:
Let’s be frank – there are a lot of smoothies out there. But if we had to nominate one for all-around best smoothie, it would be this one. Like our other smoothies, it’s an energizing boost made with real fruit and whey protein and fiber powder. But the not-so-secret-ingredient that gives this one the edge in deliciousness: the flavor of chocolate. And that flavor always wins. End of story. (What could possibly make it better? Well, you could always add a shot of espresso to it.)
